name: Rewind In Time
description:
2D + 3D + Time = Boom!

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2

Wanna see 2D sprites walking 3D cubes and travelling in 4D using a Time Machine, if yes then you are at the right place!

Congrats! You build your first time machine but was that a good idea?

Whether you are busy or not, this small game can be easily played by you!

I am sorry that this game is really small but any feedback appreciated!

The game is new so expect a few bugs but we can fix the if told those in the comment ;)
